From: Richard Dallaway <richard@...>


>Now to write testcases for Servlets,do I jump to httpunitest or stay
>with junit ?

As I understand it, you can use HttpUnit from a test in Junit.  Take a look 
at the code samples at:
http://httpunit.sourceforge.net/doc/Cookbook.html

If you want something quick and dirty, you can also try:
http://www.dallaway.com/jsptest/
...which includes some example tests.  I.e., take a look at the 
testSimpleRequest method
at http://www.dallaway.com/jsptest/JSPTestTest.txt

Richard
subject: Re: Servlet Testing - junit or httpunit
